model.usage: G√©n√©ration d'images text-to-image, transformation img2img, support LoRA

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.example: A majestic mountain landscape at sunset, cinematic lighting, highly detailed

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Negative prompt for generated image - specify what you DON'T want

strength.title: Strength
strength.description: Strength for img2img pipeline. 0 = keep original, 1 = completely new image

guidance.title: Guidance
guidance.description: Guidance for generated image. Lower values can give more realistic images. Good values to try are 2, 2.5, 3 and 3.5

num_inference_steps.title: Num Inference Steps
num_inference_steps.description: Number of denoising steps. Recommended range is 28-50. Lower = faster but lower quality.

aspect_ratio.title: aspect_ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio for the generated image

go_fast.title: Go Fast
go_fast.description: Run faster predictions with additional optimizations.

enhance_prompt.title: Enhance Prompt
enhance_prompt.description: Enhance the prompt with positive magic. Automatically improves your prompt.

lora_weights.title: Lora Weights
lora_weights.description: Load LoRA weights. Only works with text to image pipeline. Supports .safetensors URLs, tar files, and zip files

lora_scale.title: Lora Scale
lora_scale.description: Determines how strongly the main LoRA should be applied. 0 = no effect, 1 = full effect

extra_lora_weights.title: Extra Lora Weights
extra_lora_weights.description: Additional LoRA weights as comma-separated URLs. Same formats as lora_weights

extra_lora_scale.title: Extra Lora Scale
extra_lora_scale.description: Scales for additional LoRAs as comma-separated floats. Must match number of extra_lora_weights

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation

output_quality.title: Output Quality
output_quality.description: Quality when saving the output images, from 0 to 100. Not relevant for .png outputs

disable_safety_checker.title: Disable Safety Checker
disable_safety_checker.description: Disable safety checker for generated images.

output.title: Output
output.description: Array d'URLs pointant vers les images g√©n√©r√©es
output.note: Les images sont temporairement h√©berg√©es, t√©l√©charger si besoin de persistance
